column4: Anyone here have any special instructions for installing flash on ubuntu 10.10 64 bit?
open synaptic and check "flashplugin-installer", that works for me
How do I open this synpatic?
I can't open synpatics, it wants a root password thingy and I havent set up that yet, I don't know how
when it opens search for 'flash' and scroll down
it rejects the password I use to login, like before
I am told I need to go in and establish a password for the root or adminstration or whatever, but I don't know how to do that
do you log in with a password at all?
then that password should work, if not, I don't know where to direct you, maybe someone else does
Can someone help me install flash please?
you need to solve that password issue first
I need to establish a password for that administrator side or something, but you don't seem to know anything about that. Anyway other methods don't require that
